title: My Pollen Forecast - Allergies
description:
My Pollen Forecast is the best app for tracking the pollen count and your allergens. With a sleek modern design, you can view hayfever forecasts for the upcoming days and keep a diary of your symptoms. By using the app you will become more prepared for any allergy or asthma difficulties you could experience.

- Shows a map where you can see which areas have the highest pollen count!
- Several day pollen forecast including temperature, wind and humidity!
- Use the app as a tracker for how you feel to monitor your symptoms over time.
- Discover which pollens you are most allergic to by adding diary entries frequently.
- Receive push notifications when the pollen count is expected to be high!
- Full support for the latest iPhone and iPad models.

If you want the most efficient way of keeping up with pollen forecasts and counts, then My Pollen Forecast is the right app for you. This version is ad-supported and is similar to apps such as WebMD Allergy and Pollen.com.

* The app currently only supports the contiguous US and the UK. States such as Alaska and Hawaii are unfortunately not supported.*

title: Melbourne Pollen Count
description:
The Melbourne Pollen App provides Victorians with pollen forecasts generated using real-world pollen count data collected from our statewide network of monitoring sites. 
You can use the Melbourne Pollen App to track your hay fever symptoms to figure out which pollen types are triggering your symptoms. Our notification system can alert you when grass pollen levels in your area are high, helping you plan your activities. 

Since the November 2016 thunderstorm asthma event, Melbourne Pollen has worked closely with the Victorian Department of Health and Bureau of Meteorology to develop and implement a Thunderstorm Asthma forecast system to minimize the impact that any future epidemic thunderstorm asthma events may have on the community and the Victorian health system.  Our notification system can alert you to forecasts of thunderstorm asthma in your area. 


Key Features:

Accurate Pollen Forecasts: Get reliable predictions for a variety of pollen types, enabling you to identify and manage your hay fever triggers effectively.

Proactive Notifications: Receive timely alerts when grass pollen levels spike in your area, allowing you to plan your activities with confidence.

Thunderstorm Asthma Forecasts: Developed in collaboration with health authorities, the Thunderstorm Asthma forecast system helps protect the community and health system from potential future epidemics.

Contribute to Research: By participating in our surveys, you play a crucial role in advancing our understanding of pollen's impact on health, ultimately benefiting the wider community.

Comprehensive Allergy Management: From pollen counts to Thunderstorm Asthma alerts, we provide a complete suite of tools to help you navigate allergy season.

Don't let allergies hold you back! Download the Melbourne Pollen Count and Forecast App today and reclaim control of your well-being. Your comfort is our top priority! Together, let's create a healthier, more informed community.

Melbourne Pollen also conducts research aimed at better understanding the health impacts of the different types of pollen in our air.  Completing the survey regularly helps us with this important work.

title: klarify: Pollen app, Hay fever
description:
Stay ahead of your hay fever with klarify. Use the klarify pollen and allergy app to log how you feel every day and track how your pollen allergy affects you over time.

With data on pollen, weather and air quality for any location, plus a three-day forecast, allergy calendar, and tips for living with allergies, klarify can help you live your best life.

REASONS TO CHOOSE OUR OUR AWARD-WINNING POLLEN & ALLERGY APP
-	Log how you’re feeling and get insights into how your hay fever affects you 
-	Use your allergy log to compare how different types of pollen have affected you
-	Identifying what sets off your hay fever can help you manage it better
-	Know what to expect from the weather and air quality for your location
-	Get reliable forecasts for your location so you can plan ahead
-	Be able to plan your day around the pollen levels
-	Get alerts when pollen levels change in your area so you can take precautions
-	Check the allergy calendar to see an overview of the year's typical pollen levels
-	Find out more about pollen allergy triggers, allergy diagnosis and treatment

YOUR POLLEN ALLERGY TRACKER
klarify allows you to log how you feel daily and track how your hay fever affects you over time. 
Toggle between different pollen types in your allergy log to see how they affected you. Identifying what pollen triggers your hay fever can help you figure out how to deal with it more effectively. 

ACCURATE POLLEN LEVELS IN YOUR LOCATION
If you want to know what kind of pollen is in the air today, the klarify app can give you all the info you need. Check to see which pollen is at the highest level and you'll be all set to plan your activities. Get updates and pollen alerts so you can be prepared when the levels change.

Pollen levels can have a big impact on your allergy symptoms, so it's important to stay up to date on the pollen levels in your local area. Knowing the pollen levels can help you predict when your hay fever will likely flare-up.

LOCATION-BASED WEATHER AND AIR QUALITY
klarify is an app that tells you about the air quality and weather near you. The app also tells you the local temperature, humidity, and wind conditions. How you experience your hay fever depends on what type of pollen triggers your symptoms, where you live and the weather. Everyone has a personal pollen allergy season.  

ALLERGY QUESTIONS
The questions on your profile in the klarify pollen allergy app check how much you know about your pollen allergies. Smart allergy management can make a real difference. You can download your answers at any time to discuss with your doctor. 

KNOW YOUR HAY FEVER TRIGGERS
Use the klarify pollen and allergy app to find out more about the specific types of pollen that you’re allergic to. Uncover other factors that could affect your pollen allergy symptoms, such as air quality and the weather.

OUR ALLERGY EXPERTISE AT YOUR FINGERTIPS
With more than 95 years of allergy research behind us, we know a lot about how to manage allergies. And we’ve put that knowledge into the klarify app to help you keep your pollen allergies under control. As with everything we do, klarify is backed by science. 

TELL US WHAT YOU THINK OF OUR ALLERGY APP
We’d love to hear how you like our pollen allergy app. If you think there’s something we could do better, let us know: support-us@klarify.me. We’re here to help.

description:

Contribute to Research: Participate in our surveys to further our understanding of air quality and pollen impacts, ultimately improving health outcomes for all.

Community-Driven: Your insights and experiences play a pivotal role in our mission to create a healthier, more informed community.

Don't let allergies dictate your day! Download the Perth Pollen Count and Forecast App now and take control of your well-being. Your comfort is our top priority! Together, let's build a healthier, more resilient community.

title: Pollen Wise
description:
Pollen Wise has reached version 5! We've been hard at work transforming data from the network of Pollen Sense sensors into a model that includes greatly improved forecasting. 


Own Your Seasonal Allergies with Pollen Wise! Using a robust network of sensors around the United States and select other countries, Pollen Wise provides up-to-date pollen counts to help users mitigate allergens and avoid seasonal allergy symptoms. Customize Pollen Wise to put emphasis on the allergens that impact you the most, while still seeing levels across categories!


Pollen Wise is the only seasonal allergy app providing hourly allergen reports! Competing apps either use counts from yesterday or various other algorithms based on daily counts.


The advanced Automated Particle Sensor (APS) by Pollen Sense uses AI image processing to analyze images taken via a microscope to identify and classify allergens down to individual species. Particularly sensitive to Ragweed? Pollen Wise has you covered! Specific trees during tree season have your nose running? APS sensors find those too!


Airborne particulate levels can vary dramatically through the day! With Pollen Wise, you can see an up-to-date snapshot of allergens nearby and better plan your outside time.


The allergen journal feature allows you to log your symptoms to later see snapshots of your symptoms and allergen levels at that time. Please consult with a specialist if you suffer from seasonal allergies. As airborne particulate levels are impacted by weather conditions, levels can change dramatically.


While many features of Pollen Wise are free, some features require a subscription (Pollen Wise Plus). Unlock access to more historical data, an upgraded journal experience, home/lock screen widgets, and more with Pollen Wise Plus!

title: MASK-air
description:
The best application for monitoring allergic rhinitis - also called  hay fever - according to health care professionals (doctors, pharmacists) and patients. The MASK-air application has been developed by internationally-renowned allergists and has been scientifically validated.

Take immediate control of your rhinitis:
⁻ by becoming a real actor of your own health 
⁻ by preventing new crises through knowing your symptoms better and avoiding aggravation (asthma)
⁻ by having a personalized day-to-day follow-up
⁻ by measuring the effectiveness of the treatment and its possible adaptation
⁻ by anticipating crises and their management for the following year

MASK-air is an allergic rhinitis logbook - always in your pocket, user friendly, with automatic data backup, with data analysis and visual images to enable your healthcare professional (doctor and/or pharmacist) to manage you better.

Record the symptoms of your allergic crises daily as well as the impact on your quality of life and the medications taken. This will help you and your healthcare professionals to determine the diagnosis and effective treatment for YOUR allergic rhinitis.

Many patients suffer just like you from their allergies – 20 to 30% of the world's population! Help the patient community and participate in advancing research. MASK-air is an international research project aiming to better understand this pathology, for better care. The app is deployed in more than 20 countries around the world.

Allergic rhinitis is a pathology that is not "serious" in itself but that can be troublesome on a daily basis as it can cause complications such as the inability to sleep due to symptoms, excessive fatigue, development or worsening of asthma which can have an important impact on daily life such as absence from work  or repeated absence during studies...

No identifying data are collected through the use of this application. If you accept the geolocation of your symptoms, this data will be codified on our servers and will respect your privacy. All the data are kept on a secure server in Europe. 

The use of this app is not a substitute for medical advice or medical treatment. Do not change your treatment or your medication yourself based on this app without consulting your HCP. This app is not intended to record the side effects of medical treatment. If you have medical complaints or questions related to the use of the app, discuss these with your HCP.

The n° 1 app for monitoring allergic rhinitis and asthma / Easy, informative and secure / Scientifically validated / 

Answer the questionnaire every day In less than 2 minutes  / Quick / 

Understand and manage your allergy properly / Detailed reports for you and your healthcare professionals

title: DocGo
description:
URGENT CARE IN-HOME VISITS

Avoid crowded waiting rooms and get treated today with DocGo. Our licensed clinicians provide same-day visits to treat many illnesses and injuries just like an urgent care center, but in the comfort of your home. Most major insurance is accepted and we have affordable self-pay rates.

Experience the difference and let care come to you with DocGo.

Current Service Areas:
New York City including Manhattan, Brooklyn, and Queens
Nassau County and parts of Long Island
Central and Northern New Jersey

What We Treat:
We see adults and children 6 months and older for a wide range of symptoms and conditions.
 
COMMON SYMPTOMS & CONDITIONS WE TREAT
- Cold and flu 
- Sore throat and Strep 
- Fever 
- Cough 
- Congestion or sinus pain (sinusitis) 
- Itchy or red eyes (pink eye) 
- Gastrointestinal (stomach) pain or cramps 
- Nausea or vomiting 
- Diarrhea 
- Constipation 
- Respiratory infections testing and treatment 
- COVID-19 testing including Rapid Antigen and PCR (NAAT / Nucleic Acid Amplification Test) for travel 
- Heartburn / acid reflux 
- Seasonal allergies / hay fever 
- Skin rashes 
- Headaches and migraines 
- Cuts, scrapes, and minor injuries 
- Sprains and sports injuries 
- UTI / painful urination 
- Yeast infections 
- Dehydration

WE ALSO DO EXAMS
- Medical Clearance Exams
- School, Sports and Camp Physicals
- Pre-operative Screenings

FAQs

How does DocGo work? 
DocGo is a new way to get care on your terms. Unlike traditional telehealth services, we can actually come to you to treat a wide range of symptoms and illnesses. When you request a visit, we may recommend a telehealth visit based on your symptoms and provider availability. You can always request an at home visit if you are in our service area. 

For more information, you can visit our website at docgo.com/for-patients

Who can you treat? 
DocGo provides non-emergency medical care to patients 6 months and older. 

Who are DocGo Clinicians? 
All Clinicians are licensed medical professionals. All visits are conducted by an Advanced Practitioner (an NP, PA, MD, or DO).

How much does it cost to be treated? 
The amount that you will be responsible for is determined by your insurance plan. Typically, DocGo patients pay a similar or lower amount than they would for walk-in Urgent Care.

If you do not have insurance or are out of network, we charge a flat rate of $199 for house calls and $69 for telehealth visits. In this case, we provide documentation you may use to submit for insurance reimbursement on your own.

GET IN TOUCH 
- Phone and Text: 844-44DOCGO (1-844-443-6246)
- Email: patientsupport@docgo.com
- Web: https://docgo.com/for-patients

title: Pollen Club
Pollen Count UK

Pollen Count UK combines multiple data sources and advanced mathematical techniques to provide superior accuracy, precision and granularity in our pollen forecasts.

title: AllerTrack: Allergy monitor
description:
Take back control of your day with AllerTrack, your personalized allergy management companion. Whether you're planning outdoor activities, managing seasonal allergies, or simply want to stay ahead of pollen surges, AllerTrack provides the precise, hyperlocal data you need to live on your terms.

Precise pollen intelligence:
Get detailed pollen alerts broken down by tree, weed, and grass categories with subspecies-level precision. Our advanced forecasting system delivers real-time, hyperlocal pollen data so you can plan your day with confidence. No more guessing, no more surprises.

Smart allergy management:
Track your allergies your way with our intuitive logging system. Monitor your symptoms, identify triggers, and gain insights into your personal allergy patterns. Smart tracking features coming soon to make allergy management even easier.

Hyperlocal forecasting:
Know before you go with detailed pollen forecasts for your exact location. Plan that picnic, go for that run, or schedule outdoor activities when pollen levels are lowest. Our forecasts help you make informed decisions about when to step outside.

Personalized alerts:
Set custom alerts for your favorite locations and receive timely notifications about pollen surges. Stay informed about morning pollen spikes and plan accordingly. Never be caught off guard by unexpected allergy triggers again.

User-friendly experience:
AllerTrack's clean, intuitive interface makes it easy to access the information you need quickly. Save multiple locations, customize your dashboard, and get instant insights into current and forecasted pollen conditions.

Why choose AllerTrack:
Subspecies-level pollen breakdown for maximum precision
Hyperlocal forecasting for accurate, location-specific data
Personalized tracking to understand your unique allergy patterns
Morning surge alerts to help you start each day prepared
Clean, easy-to-use interface designed for daily use

AllerTrack isn't just another weather app—it's your partner in allergy management. From managing hay fever symptoms to planning outdoor adventures, AllerTrack empowers you to live confidently, no matter what's in the air.
Download AllerTrack today and transform how you manage your allergies. Plan that picnic. Go for that run. Live on your terms.

title: HeyAlly

title: The Pollen Forecast Checker
description:
The Pollen Forecast Checker is a simple yet high-quality Japanese-made app designed for people with pollen allergies.
It clearly displays which types of pollen—such as cedar, cypress, or grass—are currently in the air and in what quantities.
By checking the pollen levels before going out, the app helps you take proactive steps to reduce allergy symptoms.

Features
- Clear display of today's pollen information for your current location or selected area
- Check the pollen levels by type (cedar, cypress, grass, etc.)
- 5-day pollen forecast, including today, to help you plan ahead
- Visual indicators such as “Very High,” “Moderate,” and “Low” make it easy to understand at a glance
- Simple UI that immediately shows the necessary information when the app is opened

Recommended For
- Those who suffer from hay fever every year
- People who want to prepare masks or glasses before going out
- Parents looking to protect their young children from pollen
- Commuters and students who want quick access to pollen info on their phone
- Anyone who finds other pollen apps too cluttered or complex

Usage Scenarios
- Check pollen levels quickly while getting ready in the morning
- Refer to the forecast when planning weekend activities
- Check pollen status at your destination and prepare masks or medicine
- Convenient for those who want to use over-the-counter medication only on severe days

The Pollen Forecast Checker is designed to help you manage pollen allergies naturally in your daily life.
No unnecessary features—just the essential information delivered smartly.
If you're looking for a simple and reliable pollen app, give this one a try.

title: Allergy Sufferers
description:
UPDATE: We have completely revamped the app for 2026!

Allergy Sufferers

Get the most reliable daily pollen and spore forecasts in Canada with the Allergy Sufferers app, completely redesigned and rebuilt in 2025. Our forecasts are proven to be 80% accurate, thanks to data from Aerobiology Research Laboratories (a Canadian company in Ottawa), the only professional company in North America that collects and analyzes daily air samples from 30 stations across Canada. We are the only pollen and spore forecasters in Canada that have and use data for pollen and spore (outdoor mold) forecasting.


FREE FEATURES:

4-Day Forecast: View up to 4 days of total pollen (total trees, total weeds, total grasses) and total spores (outdoor molds) for your location.

Allergy Tips: Receive helpful tips to manage your allergy triggers.

Learn: Discover which pollen and spores are identified in different Canadian cities.

Free Trial: Access a 7-day free trial of all premium features.


UPGRADE TO PREMIUM FOR AN ALL-IN-ONE SOLUTION:

Detailed Forecasts: Get push notifications and 4-day forecasts for all individual pollen and spore (outdoor mold) varieties in the air.

Personalized Tracking: Log your daily symptoms and medications to understand your personal allergy patterns.

Data Visualizer: Use our powerful visualizer to correlate your symptoms and medication with pollen levels, helping you pinpoint your triggers.

Customization: Personalize your experience by tracking up to 7 specific allergens and 5 different locations.

Historical forecasts – Access up to 14 days of historical forecasts (5 with all pollen and spores in the air – 9 additional days of what you are specifically allergic too)

For any questions, please contact us at apps@aerobiology.ca.


WHATS NEW

4-day forecasts for all individual pollen and spores in the air

Personalize push notifications – the pollen and spores you want notifications about and the levels

Access up to 14 days of historical forecasts ( 5 with all pollen and spores in the air – 9 additional days of what you are specifically allergic too

Brand new codebase using React, new user interface for improved performance and usability


Get the most accurate science and database driven pollen and outdoor mold forecasting app for Canadian Allergy Sufferers today.  

Support the only Canadian company that monitors pollen and spores and contributes to research and science for allergy sufferers in Canada.

title: Sensio Air: Allergy Tracker
description:
Sensio Air Allergy & Pollen Tracker
Learn your symptoms causes

Discover what is causing your allergy, asthma or even COPD symptoms. Sensio Air is the best allergy and pollen tracker app for logging your symptoms and learning what is triggering your issues. 

The Sensio allergy app includes an allergy forecast that allows you to monitor thousands of common allergens, including molds, pollens, pet dander, air pollutants and more.

With our simple, intuitive interface, you can track your daily allergy symptoms, monitor potential allergens and receive pollen count and air pollution alerts in your local area. Advice from experts then helps you learn how to combat and eliminate the sources of your allergy and asthma symptoms such as hay fever, runny nose, headache and shortness of breath.

Sensio Air allergen app has air quality monitors in 350 cities around the world that provide a local pollen count and smog forecast. Daily local weather and pollen forecasts help you plan your activities.

Sensio Air allergy app helps you keep track of your air quality and your respiratory symptoms by using smart algorithms to understand your triggers.

+ Check the daily local pollution and pollen index for your area along with 350 major metropolitan areas around the world.
+ Log your symptoms with the tap of a button to keep track of your health.
+ Get daily advice to improve your health and reduce your exposure to allergens and pollutants.
+ Get local pollen, pollution, air quality alerts, forecast and know exactly what to do about them.
+ Know what might affect your COPD or Respiratory issues.
+ Track your symptoms and get detailed reports.
+ Monitor allergic reactions before you head to your doctor.
+ Log your medication intake and set reminders.

Learning more about what may be causing your symptoms will help you identify which remedies such as Allegra, Claritin, Zyrtec, Alavert, antihistamine, nasal sprays or other options could best alleviate your or your family’s health issues.

SUBSCRIPTIONS PRICING & TERMS
Sensio Air is free to download. Ongoing use requires an active subscription available on a yearly basis. Customers will be given 7 days free trial period. Yearly subscriptions are billed the total annual fee from the purchase date.

Payment will be charged to your credit card through your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription renews automatically unless canceled at least 24 hours prior to the end of the subscription period. There is no increase in price when renewing.

Subscriptions can be managed and auto-renewal turned off in Account Settings in iTunes after purchase. Once purchased, refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term.

Read our full Terms and Conditions policy:
https://www.wlab.io/terms-and-conditions

We work hard to improve the app and always appreciate your feedback.

Monitor, Understand, Log and Prevent your symptoms!

For more information, please visit www.sensioair.com

Don't hesitate to send feedback to app@wlab.io

title: Pollen Buddy – Allergy Tracker
description:
Breathe Easy with Pollen Buddy – Your Personal Allergy Tracker

Navigating through allergy seasons can be challenging, but Pollen Buddy is here to guide you. This innovative app empowers you with real-time data and personalized insights, helping you stay ahead of allergy symptoms and breathe freely.

Why Choose Pollen Buddy?

Allergy Tracker & Pollen Counter
Weather Data: 
Receive accurate, location-based weather forecasts and real-time pollen counts to prepare for the day ahead.
Symptom Log: A user-friendly interface to record and rate the severity of your symptoms, creating a comprehensive log for better understanding.
Data Correlation: Leveraging advanced algorithms, Pollen Buddy correlates your symptom data with real-time pollen levels, helping you identify specific triggers and patterns affecting your allergies.
Trend Analysis: Visualize your allergy trends through intuitive charts, comparing symptoms over time and against varying pollen levels for a deeper understanding of your allergy landscape.
Privacy-Focused: We prioritize your privacy, ensuring all your logs and information remain secure and unshared.

Apple Watch App: Experience convenience at its peak; log symptoms, check pollen counts, and receive alerts directly from your Apple Watch.

Key Features:
User-Centric Interface: Intuitive options for a seamless user experience.
Air Quality Index: Stay informed about the air quality in your region, helping you avoid potential triggers.
Symptom Severity Trends: Track the trends of various pollens and symptom severity to manage your health proactively.
Location-Based Environment Tracking: Get insights based on your provided location, ideal for allergy and asthma control.

Coming Soon:
- In-depth symptom analysis
- Predictive alerts for allergy flare-ups
- Scheduled notifications for logging
- Home and lock screen widgets for quick access
- Watch complications
- Mac app? Your feedback can shape the future of Pollen Buddy!

We value your feedback immensely. As a small indie team, we are devoted to evolving Pollen Buddy to serve you better. Share your suggestions or queries at hello@naturallyinviting.com.

Disclaimer: Pollen Buddy is designed for informational purposes and not intended to replace professional medical advice. Always consult your healthcare provider for medical concerns.

Access to Pollen Buddy features requires a monthly/yearly subscription.
Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
Privacy Policy: https://willb-me.vercel.app/privacy-policy

title: Health Weather
description:
Health Weather is an APP that pays attention to the impact of weather changes on human health, analyzes and log the impact of weather factors, predicts the health weather index, and makes early warnings for weather changes.
        Many people often have headaches or joint pains before rain. Many studies have shown that weather changes can trigger some symptoms. Some weather factors have a similar effect, such as pollen for asthma patients,  air pollution for COPD patients,But some factors do have significant individual differences, and each person's tolerance level is also very different. Therefore, it is necessary to log and analyze the weather conditions of  symptom. Comprehensive analysis may give a general reference.
       The Health Weather track and  analyzes the weather impact for  six symptoms: Arthritis, Asthma, Migraine, Sinus headache, Common cold, and COPD.
       
     【Disclaimer】
       But we must make the following statement:
       1. The APP cannot be used as a diagnostic tool. you can not  judge whether you are a patient with a symptom based on your reaction to the weather coincide with the weather forecast effect of the APP on the symptom, but you should go to the hospital doctor for a diagnosis.
       2. The App also does not give any medical advice. The app just reminds you that weather changes may affect you.
       3. Weather changes are only one of the many reasons that trigger symptoms. After using this APP, you should not only pay attention to the influence of the weather, but also the influence of other factors.

       
The APP is mainly divided into the following four parts:
1. Weather
     Hourly weather forecast and analysis, daily weather, air pollen, health index forecast
2. Log
      List of health logs, view and modify, delete
3. Analysis:
      Graphical analysis showing the influence distribution of each factor

4. Mine
     App setting 



【Membership】
1. 168 hours and 5 days weather forecast
2. 3 user roles to write log
3. remove ads
Purchase rules:
[Monthly Membership] Purchase a monthly member for $ 1.99 / month and renew it automatically every month.
[Annual Membership] 12.99 $ / year to purchase annual annual membership and automatically renew it annually.
[Lifetime Membership] $ 19.99, only need to purchase once, valid for life

[Prices in different countries or regions should be converted according to the US dollar exchange rate]

Purchase Notes:
1. The account will be automatically renewed and deducted the corresponding fee 1 day before the expiration.
2. If you need to cancel the renewal, please cancel in your personal iTunes account at least 1 day in advance.
3. After purchase, users can manage or turn off automatic renewal in personal account settings.

Terms of Services : 
https://www.astronomyobserver.net/healthweather/user/en
Privacy policy: 
https://www.astronomyobserver.net/healthweather/privacy/en

title: Sonu
description:
SONU provides personalized, drug free, acoustic resonance therapy to treat nasal congestion symptoms caused by allergic and non-allergic rhinitis. SONU is backed by FDA authorization, extensive clinical trials, and enhanced by AI. SONU works with iPhone X or later models and uses Bluetooth to connect with your iPhone. 
To get started simply download the app and follow the on-screen instructions to get to your 15 minute treatment session. You can choose to relax with the gentle micro vibrations or go about your daily activities. The SONU app takes a scan of your face using the front facing camera and personalizes the acoustic therapy based on your facial anatomy and other proprietary factors. The acoustic resonance is delivered via medical grade bone conduction transducers in the SONU band (a lightweight, wearable headband purchased separately). 
SONU is proven to be safe and effective and also has a history of your treatment sessions in the app so you can track your usage over time. Please consult your doctor before making any medical decisions. 

Any feedback? Contact us at https://soundhealth.life/contact/
Additional information including the privacy policy, biometric notice and terms of use can be found at https://soundhealth.life

title: AirScope: Pollen & Air Quality
description:
AirScope provides hyper-local air quality data for millions of locations across the globe. Find real-time and forecast AQI / air quality and pollution data, daily pollen counts and five-day allergy forecasts, weather, and more. View realtime NOAA doppler radars and weather maps for pollen, pollution, air quality, and more.

No subscription is required! Access 100% of the app's features, maps, and content without a subscription.

Interact with high resolution maps of air quality and pollen concentrations, and animate up to fifteen days (10-day history and 5-day forecast) of map data. Discover the plants and allergens affecting your health with a detailed pollen and spore species analysis and daily pollen counts (where available).

Map Layers and Weather Radars:
- Air Quality Index (AQI)
- Grass Pollen
- Tree Pollen
- Weed Pollen
- Grass Pollen Forecast (15 day animation)
- Tree Pollen Forecast (15 day animation)
- Weed Pollen Forecast (15 day animation)
- Mold Spore Forecast (15 day animation)
- PM2.5 Forecast (24 hr animation)
- Ozone Forecast (24 hr animation)
- Surface Dust Forecast (24 hr animation)
- Near-Surface Smoke
- Vertically Integrated Smoke
- Ozone
- Nitrogen Dioxide
- Particulate Matter 2.5
- Particulate Matter 10
- Sulfur Dioxide
- Carbon Dioxide
- Surface Visibility
- Fire Detections
- Fire Radiative Power
- Base Reflectivity (updated every 2 min; animated)
- Composite Reflectivity (updated every 2 min; animated)
- Precipitation Type (updated every 2 min; animated)
- Echo Tops (updated every 2 min; animated)
- Infrared Satellite (updated every 10 min; 40 minute delay)
- Temperature
- Pressure
- Wind Speed
- Cloud Coverage
- Active Wildfires and Prescribed Burns (US)
- NWS Warnings, Watches, Alerts, and Statements (US)

Many competing weather apps require subscriptions to access premium maps and content. We wanted to do better! All features in AirScope are accessible for free, including our realtime NOAA doppler radars and premium map features.

AirScope offers significantly more data than our competition by combining tens of thousands of data providers and sources across the globe. We aggregate atmospheric data from leading providers such as PurpleAir, AccuWeather, and OpenWeather, as well as from individual state and local government entities (e.g., NOAA, AirNow, NWS), publicly available sources, and sampling participant networks.

Real-time and forecast atmospheric data:
- Air Quality Index (AQI) for PM2.5, PM10, and Ozone
- Airborne pollutant concentrations and hourly forecast graphs for PM2.5, PM10, Ozone, Carbon Monoxide (CO), Nitrogen Oxides (NO, NO2), Sulfur Dioxide (SO2), and Ammonia
- Pollen counts and allergen forecasts (updated daily) for grass, trees, ragweed, and mold
- Weather including current and high/low temperatures, humidity, atmospheric pressure, wind direction and speed, precipitation forecast

Detailed Pollen Tracking:
Stay informed about grass, weed, tree, and mold pollen counts in your area, including predominant pollen types and species data.

Symptom Tracker: 
Log daily health symptoms, uncover potential environmental triggers, and receive personalized insights to protect your well-being. Ideal for individuals with respiratory conditions or anyone interested in maintaining a healthier lifestyle, AirScope equips you with the tools to understand and improve your air quality exposure.

title: Kleenex Pollen Count, Forecast
description:
Your personalised pollen forecast, made for the UK.
Kleenex Your Pollen Pal is the ultimate companion for allergy season. Whether you’re managing hay fever, allergic rhinitis or just looking to understand your symptoms better, this free app gives you tailored insights to help you stay one step ahead of pollen peaks.

With trusted UK pollen data, a clean new design and powerful upcoming features like a daily symptom diary and smart pollen alerts, Your Pollen Pal helps you make informed choices, before the sneezing starts.

New Features

Refreshed app design
We’ve completely redesigned the interface to be clearer and more intuitive. Navigating your local forecast is now faster and easier than ever.

Goodbye emoji tracker, hello Symptom Diary 
The old emoji based symptom tracker has been removed. In its place, we’ve rolled out a brand new daily symptom diary that lets you log how you’re feeling each day and connect the dots between symptoms and environmental triggers like pollen levels.

Smart pollen alerts 
Opt in to receive push notifications when pollen levels are forecast to spike in your saved location, giving you time to prep or plan your day differently.

Now UK only
We’ve streamlined the app to focus exclusively on the UK pollen forecast. This allows us to provide more accurate and relevant data for British users. International pollen data has been removed.

Pollen quiz prompt
Curious about which types of pollen might be affecting you? A new in app prompt links you to a helpful pollen quiz on the Kleenex website for extra insight.

Registered vs Guest Access
You can explore the app as a guest, but some features are only available once you register. Signing up is quick and free.

Features that make a difference

UK wide 5 day pollen forecast
Get a clear, reliable forecast for your area, covering tree, grass and weed pollen, so you can plan your activities with confidence.

Location specific insights
Save your favourite places (home, office, weekend getaway) to get tailored forecasts that reflect your real world movements.

Expert backed data
Forecasts are based on trusted UK sources and updated regularly to reflect changing pollen conditions.

title: Allergy Alert Pollen Forecast
description:
Never be surprised by pollen again.
Pollen alerts for your location, when you need them. An app that protects your health and your data.

Pollen forecasts for your location.
Localized pollen forecasts and proactive notifications at the time you choose. Stay one step ahead of your allergies with a tool that puts your health and your privacy first.

Timely, Smart Notifications
Set it and forget it. Choose the exact time you want to receive your daily pollen alert, and we'll deliver the day's forecast directly to you. Start your day prepared and manage your allergy symptoms before they start.

Your privacy is our priority.
Welcome to a truly private allergy app. Your personalized settings are stored exclusively on your device and are never sent to a server. That means no tracking, no user accounts, and no compromises on your data.

Ready in seconds.
No complicated sign-ups or lengthy registrations. Just download the app, select the pollens you're allergic to, and set your notification time. You're all set to take control of your allergies.

title: Pollenvarsel
description:
Appen Pollenvarsel gir deg pollenprognoser for både i dag og i morgen. Slik kan du som pollenallergiker enklere planlegge dagen din, og dermed ha det bedre i pollensesongen.

Du kan velge å aktivere push-varslinger ved kraftig eller ekstrem spredning i din valgte region, for dine utvalgte pollentyper.
Informasjonen oppdateres jevnlig fra de 13 målestasjonene våre, som er plassert på ulike steder i landet.

Varselet omfatter pollentypene:

• Or
• Hassel
• Bjørk
• Salix
• Gress
• Burot

Appens funksjoner:

• Todøgns prognose for pollen
• Pollenvarsel basert på GPS-lokasjon – sikrer deg mest relevante tall for din plassering
• Personlig pollenprofil – du velger hvilke pollentyper du vil ha varslet
• Dagbok – her har du muligheten til å legge inn symptomer du opplever
• Polleninformasjon og varselinformasjon

Pollendata kan vises som grafiske elementer eller i en tabell. Dette kan endres i menyvalget «Profil».

Ønsker du å overføre dagboken til en annen enhet kan dette også gjøres i menyvalget «Profil».

Appen og tilhørende data leveres av Norges Astma- og Allergiforbund.

Pollendata leveres på oppdrag av Helsedirektoratet.

Appen er gratis, men det er mulig å bli medlem i Astma- og Allergiforbundet direkte via appen under profilsiden. Slik kan du hjelpe oss med å vedlikeholde appen, samt bidra til at vi kan levere tilbud som rådgivningstjeneste, informasjonsarbeid for målgruppen og lignende. Takk for støtten!

title: Pollen+
description:
In co-operation with local and international institutions, the Association Austrian Pollen Information offers a pollen forecast for the next few days in your region.

The offer is available for Austria, Germany, France, Great Britain, Italy, Poland, Sweden, Switzerland, Spain and Turkey. Other countries will follow soon.

Pollen+ offers much more than just pollen information (availability varies from region to region). In addition to the asthma weather forecast and the severe weather warning, you can benefit from two models that create a personalised symptom. This is based on your entries in the Patients Hay-fever Diary (PHD). 
Thanks to a direct link, you can quickly document allergy symptoms in the PHD and benefit from personalised exposure warnings if you use it regularly. In addition, you receive push notifications and reminders at selected flowering times to keep you informed about the current situation (limited availability). 
The plant compass provides you with additional information on allergenic plants. 

New from 2024 (availability varies regionally):
PASYFO symptom prediction
Plant compass

Co-operation partner
- Austria: Austrian Pollen Information Service, GeoSphere Austria GmbH and Finnish Meteorological Institute
- Germany: German Pollen Information Service Foundation, German Weather Service and Finnish Meteorological Institute
- France: RNSA (Le Réseau National de Surveillance Aérobiologique) and Finnish Meteorological Institute
- Italy: Provincial Agency for Climate and Environmental Protection, Autonomous Province of Bolzano, South Tyrol
- Sweden: Stockholm Natural History Museum (Naturhistoriska Riksmuseet Stockholm)
- Spain: European Aeroallergen Network (EAN) in cooperation with the Spanish Aerobiology Network (REA), the Finnish Meteorological Institute (FMI Helsinki)
- PASYFO: Vilnius University, University of Latvia and Copernicus

By downloading this app, you accept the terms of use: https://www.polleninformation.at/nutzungsbedingungen-datenschutz.html

title: Dagens Pollental
description:
Dagens Pollental er den bedste måde at få dine daglige pollenopdateringer!
Opret en personlig pollenprofil og få de seneste tal, målinger og grafer – direkte på mobilen. 
Astma-Allergi Danmark har målt pollental i 40 år og dette er foreningen egen app, der sikrer, at du altid er opdateret med de korrekte og seneste tal. 

Gratis funktioner:

- Femdøgnsprognose for pollen (unik funktion fra Astma-Allergi Danmark)
- Personlig pollenprofil - Du får kun vist tal for relevante pollentyper.
- Dagligt overblik – Få et hurtigt overblik over dagens forventede pollenniveau og se det aktuelle pollental. 
- Mulighed for push-meddelelser – Få besked om de seneste målinger så snart de er tilgængelige.
- Dagbog – Hold styr på dine symptomer og sammenhold dem med pollensæsonen. 
- Sæsonoverblik – Få et komplet overblik over den aktuelle pollensæson (og tidligere) via detaljerede grafer.
- Vejrudsigt – Vejret spiller en stor rolle for pollen, derfor kan du nu følge vejret netop der, hvor du er.
- Leksikon – Omfattende beskrivelser af pollentyper, krydsreaktioner, voksesteder, udseende og meget, meget mere.
- Personlig rådgivning – Ring direkte til en personlig rådgiver fra app’en. Astma-Allergi Danmarks personale sidder klar til at besvare spørgsmål om høfeber og allergi.
- GPS styret pollenvarsling – Så er du sikret det mest relevante tal for din placering!

Vores app er GRATIS, men vi giver alle mulighed for at blive medlem af Astma-Allergi Danmark – direkte via app’en (under Profil). På den måde sikrer du, at vi kan blive ved med at måle pollen og vedligeholde vores app. Tak for støtten!

title: Ambee: Air Quality & Pollen
description:
Stay informed, stay prepared, and stay safe with Ambee, the ultimate weather app and your personalized environmental health companion. Whether you’re managing allergies or keeping an eye on the local weather, Ambee provides the comprehensive climate data you need.

Personalization & Alerts:
Set up air quality alerts and pollen alerts in Ambee to stay ahead of environmental changes. Our app uses guidelines from the National Allergy Bureau (NAB) and the US Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) to deliver timely updates on pollen count and pollution levels. Save multiple locations to receive personalized notifications, ensuring you're always prepared.
Comprehensive Climate & Pollen Information:
Ambee delivers detailed climate data, including the Air Quality Index (AQI), current temperature, UV index, precipitation, humidity and much more. Dive into our enhanced air quality maps, temperature maps along with pollen maps showing pollen count categorized by tree, grass, and weed, with a breakdown into specific subspecies for a better understanding of allergy triggers.
Enhanced Air Quality Insights:
Beyond the overall AQI, Ambee now offers detailed information on six specific pollutants. This data helps you monitor air quality in real-time with our intuitive air quality map, empowering you to make informed decisions about your outdoor activities.
Enhanced Forecasting:
Our weather app includes advanced forecasting features:
Pollen Forecast: Access a 5-day pollen forecast with three-hourly intervals to better plan your days around potential allergy triggers.
Weather Forecast: Our forecasts now include humidity and precipitation data alongside temperature, giving you a comprehensive view of the local weather.
Interactive Visualizations & Heatmaps:
Interpret air quality and pollen levels quickly with our user-friendly heatmaps. Ambee’s temperature maps and summary tiles for AQI, Pollen, Weather, and UV Index offer a comprehensive snapshot of environmental conditions in your preferred locations.
User Experience:
Customize your Ambee dashboard by saving your favorite locations with custom labels for quick access and selecting temperature units (Fahrenheit or Celsius) to suit your regional preference.
Accessibility:
Accessing Ambee is straightforward, whether you log in with your Google or Apple account or use the app as a guest.
Ambee is more than just a weather app—it's a tool that empowers you to make informed decisions based on real-time environmental data. From planning your morning jog to managing allergy symptoms, Ambee puts crucial environmental awareness at your fingertips.
Download Ambee today and transform how you engage with your environment. With Ambee, you’re always equipped with the latest air quality alerts, pollen alerts, and weather forecasts.

title: klarify: Pollen & Allergy App
description:
Use the klarify pollen and allergy app to log how you feel every day and track how your pollen allergy affects you over time.

With data on pollen, weather and air quality for any location, plus a three-day forecast, allergy calendar, and tips for living with allergies, klarify can help you live your best life.

REASONS TO CHOOSE OUR OUR AWARD-WINNING POLLEN & ALLERGY APP
-	Log how you’re feeling and get insights into how your hay fever affects you 
-	Use your allergy log to compare how different types of pollen have affected you
-	Identifying what sets off your hay fever can help you manage it better
-	Know what to expect from the weather and air quality for your location
-	Get reliable forecasts for your location so you can plan ahead
-	Be able to plan your day around the pollen levels
-	Get alerts when pollen levels change in your area so you can take precautions
-	Check the allergy calendar to see an overview of the year's typical pollen levels
-	Find out more about pollen allergy triggers, allergy diagnosis and treatment

YOUR POLLEN ALLERGY TRACKER
klarify allows you to log how you feel daily and track how your hay fever affects you over time. 
Toggle between different pollen types in your allergy log to see how they affected you. Identifying what pollen triggers your hay fever can help you figure out how to deal with it more effectively. 

ACCURATE POLLEN LEVELS IN YOUR LOCATION
If you want to know what kind of pollen is in the air today, the klarify app can give you all the info you need. Check to see which pollen is at the highest level and you'll be all set to plan your activities. Get updates and pollen alerts so you can be prepared when the levels change.

Pollen levels can have a big impact on your allergy symptoms, so it's important to stay up to date on the pollen levels in your local area. Knowing the pollen levels can help you predict when your hay fever will likely flare-up.

LOCATION-BASED WEATHER AND AIR QUALITY
klarify is an app that tells you about the air quality and weather near you. The app also tells you the local temperature, humidity, and wind conditions. How you experience your hay fever depends on what type of pollen triggers your symptoms, where you live and the weather. Everyone has a personal pollen allergy season.  

ALLERGY QUESTIONS
The questions on your profile in the klarify pollen allergy app check how much you know about your pollen allergies. Smart allergy management can make a real difference. You can download your answers at any time to discuss with your doctor. 

KNOW YOUR HAY FEVER TRIGGERS
Use the klarify pollen and allergy app to find out more about the specific types of pollen that you’re allergic to. Uncover other factors that could affect your pollen allergy symptoms, such as air quality and the weather.

OUR ALLERGY EXPERTISE AT YOUR FINGERTIPS
With more than 95 years of allergy research behind us, we know a lot about how to manage allergies. And we’ve put that knowledge into the klarify app to help you keep your pollen allergies under control. As with everything we do, klarify is backed by science. 

TELL US WHAT YOU THINK OF OUR ALLERGY APP
We’d love to hear how you like our pollen allergy app. If you think there’s something we could do better, let us know: support-us@klarify.me. We’re here to help.

title: Melbourne Pollen Count
description:
The Melbourne Pollen App provides Victorians with pollen forecasts generated using real-world pollen count data collected from our statewide network of monitoring sites. 
You can use the Melbourne Pollen App to track your hay fever symptoms to figure out which pollen types are triggering your symptoms. Our notification system can alert you when grass pollen levels in your area are high, helping you plan your activities. 

Since the November 2016 thunderstorm asthma event, Melbourne Pollen has worked closely with the Victorian Department of Health and Bureau of Meteorology to develop and implement a Thunderstorm Asthma forecast system to minimize the impact that any future epidemic thunderstorm asthma events may have on the community and the Victorian health system.  Our notification system can alert you to forecasts of thunderstorm asthma in your area. 


Key Features:

Accurate Pollen Forecasts: Get reliable predictions for a variety of pollen types, enabling you to identify and manage your hay fever triggers effectively.

Proactive Notifications: Receive timely alerts when grass pollen levels spike in your area, allowing you to plan your activities with confidence.

Thunderstorm Asthma Forecasts: Developed in collaboration with health authorities, the Thunderstorm Asthma forecast system helps protect the community and health system from potential future epidemics.

Contribute to Research: By participating in our surveys, you play a crucial role in advancing our understanding of pollen's impact on health, ultimately benefiting the wider community.

Comprehensive Allergy Management: From pollen counts to Thunderstorm Asthma alerts, we provide a complete suite of tools to help you navigate allergy season.

Don't let allergies hold you back! Download the Melbourne Pollen Count and Forecast App today and reclaim control of your well-being. Your comfort is our top priority! Together, let's create a healthier, more informed community.

Melbourne Pollen also conducts research aimed at better understanding the health impacts of the different types of pollen in our air.  Completing the survey regularly helps us with this important work.

title: Pollen Wise
description:
Pollen Wise has reached version 5! We've been hard at work transforming data from the network of Pollen Sense sensors into a model that includes greatly improved forecasting. 


Own Your Seasonal Allergies with Pollen Wise! Using a robust network of sensors around the United States and select other countries, Pollen Wise provides up-to-date pollen counts to help users mitigate allergens and avoid seasonal allergy symptoms. Customize Pollen Wise to put emphasis on the allergens that impact you the most, while still seeing levels across categories!


Pollen Wise is the only seasonal allergy app providing hourly allergen reports! Competing apps either use counts from yesterday or various other algorithms based on daily counts.


The advanced Automated Particle Sensor (APS) by Pollen Sense uses AI image processing to analyze images taken via a microscope to identify and classify allergens down to individual species. Particularly sensitive to Ragweed? Pollen Wise has you covered! Specific trees during tree season have your nose running? APS sensors find those too!


Airborne particulate levels can vary dramatically through the day! With Pollen Wise, you can see an up-to-date snapshot of allergens nearby and better plan your outside time.


The allergen journal feature allows you to log your symptoms to later see snapshots of your symptoms and allergen levels at that time. Please consult with a specialist if you suffer from seasonal allergies. As airborne particulate levels are impacted by weather conditions, levels can change dramatically.


While many features of Pollen Wise are free, some features require a subscription (Pollen Wise Plus). Unlock access to more historical data, an upgraded journal experience, home/lock screen widgets, and more with Pollen Wise Plus!

title: Canberra Pollen Count
description:
Canberra Pollen Count & Forecast: Your Allergy Ally! 

Tired of allergy woes? Take charge of your well-being with the Canberra Pollen Count and Forecast App! Our app is your trusted companion for precise pollen forecasts, providing you with real-time data from an extensive monitoring network. Say goodbye to sneezes and sniffles as you gain insights into a wide array of pollen types and take control of your health.


Key Features:

Comprehensive Allergen Forecasts: From grass to trees, get accurate predictions for a range of allergens to understand what's triggering your symptoms.

Proactive Notifications: Stay ahead of high pollen days with timely alerts, allowing you to plan your activities with confidence.

Hay Fever Symptom Tracker: Monitor and analyze your hay fever symptoms to gain valuable insights into your allergy triggers.

Contribute to Research: By participating in our surveys, you contribute to vital research aimed at enhancing allergy management for everyone.


Why Choose Us?

Personalized Allergy Management: Tailored insights help you understand and manage your allergies more effectively.

Stay Prepared: Proactive notifications ensure you're always ready to face environmental challenges head-on.

Support Vital Research: Your involvement in our surveys fuels research to improve allergy management for individuals everywhere.

Don't let allergies control your life! Download the Canberra Pollen Count and Forecast App today and regain control of your well-being. Together, let's create a healthier, more informed community.

title: MASK-air
description:
The best application for monitoring allergic rhinitis - also called  hay fever - according to health care professionals (doctors, pharmacists) and patients. The MASK-air application has been developed by internationally-renowned allergists and has been scientifically validated.

Take immediate control of your rhinitis:
⁻ by becoming a real actor of your own health 
⁻ by preventing new crises through knowing your symptoms better and avoiding aggravation (asthma)
⁻ by having a personalized day-to-day follow-up
⁻ by measuring the effectiveness of the treatment and its possible adaptation
⁻ by anticipating crises and their management for the following year

MASK-air is an allergic rhinitis logbook - always in your pocket, user friendly, with automatic data backup, with data analysis and visual images to enable your healthcare professional (doctor and/or pharmacist) to manage you better.

Record the symptoms of your allergic crises daily as well as the impact on your quality of life and the medications taken. This will help you and your healthcare professionals to determine the diagnosis and effective treatment for YOUR allergic rhinitis.

Many patients suffer just like you from their allergies – 20 to 30% of the world's population! Help the patient community and participate in advancing research. MASK-air is an international research project aiming to better understand this pathology, for better care. The app is deployed in more than 20 countries around the world.

Allergic rhinitis is a pathology that is not "serious" in itself but that can be troublesome on a daily basis as it can cause complications such as the inability to sleep due to symptoms, excessive fatigue, development or worsening of asthma which can have an important impact on daily life such as absence from work  or repeated absence during studies...

No identifying data are collected through the use of this application. If you accept the geolocation of your symptoms, this data will be codified on our servers and will respect your privacy. All the data are kept on a secure server in Europe. 

The n° 1 app for monitoring allergic rhinitis and asthma / Easy, informative and secure / Scientifically validated / 

Answer the questionnaire every day In less than 2 minutes  / Quick / 

Understand and manage your allergy properly / Detailed reports for you and your healthcare professionals
